name: Spspspace Mission
description:
A GameBoy Styled game about a cat and its journey through a strange planet trying to fix her crashed spaceship.

This game has been developed for the GBJAM 9.

The distribution of controls is as follows:

GameBoy ButtonKeyboard keyAZ
BXSTARTENTER

The game has been developed mainly by:

@Dekotale - Designer and programmer.

@hghostt - Artist, animator and designer.
